name: POWERFUL 777-200 Takeoff from DFW!
description:
A teaser video... This video shows a night time take off from Dallas Fort Worth, from First Class seat 1A, in an American Airlines Boeing 777-200. This lightly loaded aircraft springs off the runway after a short takeoff roll. 

Watch the video and look at the impressive climb performance!

This is a raw, unedited and unsubtitled clip.

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
